steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Put(number_in_box(3), into_box(1)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 2), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 2), number_in_box(2)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(6)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 2), number_in_box(7)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(2)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(3), number_in_box(2), put_result_into_box(7)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 1), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(5), then_go_to_step(4)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 1), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(4), into_box(1)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 7?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在7号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Put ( number in box 3 ) into box 1
Change Instruction 6: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 2 )
Change Instruction 6: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 7 )
Multiply: ( number in box 3 ) * ( number in box 2 ), put result into box 7.
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Change Instruction 6: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 4 ) into box 1
desc_zh: 将3号盒子中的数字放在1号盒子中
更改指令6：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令6中第2个盒子的编号比2号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令6：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令1中第2个盒子的编号比7号盒子中的数字大吗
相乘：3号盒子中的数字*2号盒子中的数字，将结果放在7号盒子中。
判断：指令6中第1个盒子的编号比5号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令6：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
将4号盒子中的数字放在1号盒子中
